text: 2.9 Jon 1.42, Lom 1.5, Epe 3.8 Jemis, Pita, Jon kɨlop bɨawl apal ak pen, kɨli God yɨp wog anɨb ak aglek nɨgɨlak tek, wog chɨn adek nokom gɨpun agɨl, Banabas chɨlop ñɨn pak sakɨlak. Anɨgɨl takaw ag adek nokom lɨl agɨnok, Banabas chɨl binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop God takaw agñɨnɨgabul, nɨbi Juda binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨnɨmɨb agɨnok.
